mapper.select: select to_char(T.today_time, 'YYYY/MM') sales_time, sum(t.total_price) total_sales from today T inner join branch B on T.branch_no = B.branch_no where status='1' and to_char(T.today_time,'YYYY') = #{year} and B.branch_no=#{branch_no, jdbcType=INTEGER} group by to_char(T.today_time,'YYYY/MM') order by sales_time asc

select M.menu_name, M.menu_price, sum(G.count) count, to_char(T.today_time,'YYYY/MM') sales_time from menu M left outer join branch_menu BM on M.menu_no = BM.menu_no left outer join goods G on BM.bm_no = G.bm_no left outer join today T on G.order_no = T.order_no where status ='1' and to_char(T.today_time,'YYYY/MM') = #{day} and M.menu_no = #{menu_no} group by to_char(T.today_time,'YYYY/MM'), M.menu_name, M.menu_price

select B.branch_no,B.branch_name,sum(total_price) total from today T inner join branch B on T.branch_no=B.branch_no where to_char(today_time,'YYYY/MM')=#{choiceDate} group by B.branch_no,B.branch_name order by B.branch_name asc
select * from branch order by branch_name asc
select bm_no from branch_menu where branch_no = #{branch_no}

select M.menu_name, M.menu_price, sum(G.count) menu_total_prcie, to_char(T.today_time,'YYYY/MM') sales_time from menu M left outer join branch_menu BM on M.menu_no = BM.menu_no left outer join goods G on BM.bm_no = G.bm_no left outer join today T on G.order_no = T.order_no where T.status ='1' and to_char(T.today_time,'YYYY/MM') = #{sysdate} and BM.bm_no = #{bm_no} and BM.branch_no = #{branch_no} group by to_char(T.today_time,'YYYY/MM'), M.menu_name, M.menu_price
